content.caption: 🌟 Ready to level up your professional game? Here are some simple tips to boost your productivity and keep you motivated! 🚀✨ Share your favorite tips in the comments below and let’s support each other on this journey! 💪💼 #CareerGrowth #ProfessionalTips

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

content.media_prompt: A tips social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: 🌟 Ready to level up your professional game? Here are some simple tips to boost your productivity and, high quality, professional, Instagram-worthy, bright and engaging, modern aesthetic
